code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import AxiosApi from"../../axios/ProductAxios";import Slider from"react-slick";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NewsList=()=>{const[list,setList]=useState([]);const testList=async()=>{const response=await AxiosApi.newsGet();setList(response.data);};const NextArrow=props=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nextArrow",onClick:props.onClick,children:"\uFF1E"});const PrevArrow=props=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"prevArrow",onClick:props.onClick,children:"\uFF1C"});useEffect(()=>{testList();},[]);const settings={infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:3,slidesToScroll:3,nextArrow:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NextArrow,{}),prevArrow:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PrevArrow,{})};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{...settings,children:list.map((data,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"image-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"testimg",src:data.newsImage,style:{width:"400px",height:"300px"},onDoubleClick:()=>window.location.href=data.newsLink}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{padding:"0 16px"},children:data.newsTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{padding:"0 16px"},children:["\uD83D\uDC4D\uD83C\uDFFB ",data.newsLikes]})]},index))});};export default NewsList;
